## Description {#details}

Flags controlling how much is checked when sinking or hoisting instructions.

The number of memory access in the loop (and whether there are too many) is determined in the constructors when using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssa">MemorySSA</a>.

Definition at line 120 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/looputils-h">LoopUtils.h</a>.
